extendedInfo.description: Calendar Snooze provides every feature you've wished was available in the stock Android calendar's reminders, and some you never thought of.No need to switch calendar apps just to get a robust reminder and alarm system: Calendar Snooze completely replaces the alarms and reminders of the stock calendar and is compatible with any apps that use your Google calendar data like Calendar Pad, Jorte, etc.A well laid-out pop-up alerts you to upcoming calendar events with user-customized quick preset snooze buttons, and a user-customized drop-down menu of snooze options.You can customize notification sound/LED, including optional user-customized speech: know what's going on without even looking at your phone!Calendar Snooze will also repeat reminders: did you miss the alarm the first time around? Configure how many times and how often Calendar Snooze should nag you. Never flake on an important appointment again!  - adjustable snoozetimes - Repeats calendar alerts(nag)  - Choose your reminder sound,vibration,led,speech - Snooze till/for/before - Corp calendar - Snooze presets- no background indexing like other aps.Free version is add supported.Free version has snooze limit of 6 hours.(but you can reschedule with the edit button)Works great with lot of calendar apps, like :Business Calendar, Calendar Pad, etc***************************************Mail me if u have a problems, I can't respond to comments made here***************************************DON'T USE "ON TIME" REMINDER ON ANDROID 2.3 MOSTLY THEY DON'T WORK..IT'S A ANDROID THING..NOT A BUG IN THIS APP*************************************** installed size ~700kb (about average) Keywords.calendar reminder, calendar notification, calendar alarm, calendar alert,repeating reminder, snoozing reminder, calendar nag, repeating reminder, calendar notification reminder, calendar notifier, appointment reminder,agenda reminder,mybackup

reviews.title: Makes me snooze easier.
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I\'m looking for: allows for snooze times of any amount of time you choose. The times can be preconfigured for easy single touch snoozing - OR - you can manually specify snooze time when the alert pops up. I will be buying the full verison.  Great simple app!
reviews.author: Robert White

reviews.title: Works on my Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: This is the first app I\'ve found that actually works on my Samsung Galaxy S3!  I installed 3 or 4 before this and they mostly did nothing to change the ring tone for notifications for my calendar.  This one rocks!  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: It\'s a very handy app. Seems to work just fine but have only used it for a couple of days. I\'d love to see a nicer UI, the one it has now is very dull.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App but hangs up calls?
reviews.comment: Does anyone experience call being hang up when an Calendar Snooze alert goes off?  Dropped my call a couple of times when an alert i set goes off... would have been a 5 stars...
reviews.author: Thomas Chung

reviews.title: My absolute favorite app.
reviews.comment: Absolute must have.  Never again miss a calendar event because you didn\'t watch your calendar.  Have been using this app for years hasn\'t failed me yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great extention
reviews.comment: Works really good, google should inplement all the feature of the app in the standard calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app! I have many meds I\'m required to take at several different times a day; this app keeps me on time for all of them. You do have to keep it on the phone, it doesn\'t work from the SD card. The developer told me that after I had moved it there and suddenly started having problems I\'d never had before. I moved it back and it has been working perfectly again. Definitely recommend this app to everyone!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but a bit confusing
reviews.comment: Some of the options sound redundant but it works overall. Love the ability to speak the text of the calendar entry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please show weekday when snoozing like before
reviews.comment: I was horrified to see that the weekday no longer is shown when snoozing.  Is this specific to my galaxy s3?  I will need to fand a new app, I never know what date next Fri is on or things like that...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: The one most useful app on my phone. Packed with features plays very well with others and keeps me on track like nothing else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the first apps I install on my phone
reviews.comment: Love this app! Use it everyday and it is one of the first applications I install on my phone! Only thing I\'d change is some more customization on the alert itself, for example different icons for the alert, smoother look and feel, etc
reviews.author: Ricardo Cl\303\251rigo

reviews.title: Needs some work but great overall
reviews.comment: Has some issues with setting vibrate and other options but works really well. the way HTC\'s Sense works (when it does) is vastly inferior to my old Motorola Milestone\'s and this app has been reliable and easy to use. Needs a settings backup which author says is on the todo list. Agree with others that $5 is too much but will probably pay it anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: droid bionic ics reminder not showing in lock scr
reviews.comment: after i updated my droid bionic to ics, reminders do not show up when in the lock screen. before the update a reminder would show up on the screen even when the phone was locked. now it does not, i have to unlock the phone to view the reminder. this was a VERY important feature and it really sucks now that it doesn\'t work this way anymore. if this got fixed, i would rate this application much higher.  schleprock
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Necessity is the mother of invention
reviews.comment: Ever accidentally dismissed an important reminder when unlocking your screen? This app is for you. Speech is the icing on the cake. Love Love Love this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems like it would be a great app. The only problem is the refresh time. It might alert me about an event that I setup a few weeks ago, but if I set an event today for later on, it completely ignores it\tWorks on and off. When it works,  its great, but sometimes it just chooses not to remind me and in my busy life I can\'t afford to miss a beat.
reviews.author: Christl-violett Daze

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: There is now a much better alternative called CER: Calendar Event Reminder. I only moved to CER because calendar snooze has been left behind with no development and old UI. It\'s a shame as I\'d happily pay for a new and improved  Calendar Snooze version - but it\'s too late now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Please add capability to snooze tasks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Support and functionality has dried up
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a good year, and even bought the snooze key to avoid app and to support the dev. That was on Gingerbread roms. Since upgrading to ICS it doesn\'t fire the reminders. Sent an email to the dev, about a month later, he replied and said re-install it. Did that, and no joy. Sent another email and no reply. Keep in mind, I know what I\'m doing with this app, and it always worked before.  I\'d think twice if I was going to pay any money to this dev. If you need more proof, sort the reviews by \"the newest\". I\'m not alone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did you even test the update?!
reviews.comment: Developers, what heck happen with the update?!! I wish I hadn\'t updated...that will teach me. I mean, the app does one simple thing, manage reminders, and you can\'t get it right. After edit, reminder does not go away even though you state it\'s resolved in the release notes. It worked BEFORE the update, so why did you break it? So glad i\'m still  trying out the ad supported version and didn\'t waste my money buying it. I hate sloppy programing. On to the next one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a great little app
reviews.comment: The calendar is an important part of my phone but, unlike a lot of people, I no longer have many rigid appointments but I do use it for reminders - most of which can be deferred if I so choose. This app modifies the standard calendar exactly as I want it.   Firstly, when a reminder comes up, it \"bongs\" gently every minute until you do something about it, so you can\'t just let it slip past, then, when you do decide to do something about it, you have a vast number of options for how long to snooze for if that\'s what you want.   Perfect.  No sign in my version of the complaints by Pete on June 7th, or jjmac on July 12th. Looks like they were fioxed as requested.
reviews.author: A Google User
